dict.acceptation: 城镇，市镇；小村庄；城镇居民；商业中心；

sent.orig: In short, puqi seafood town, military town town folk culture.
sent.trans: 总之，蒲岐是海鲜镇、军事古镇、民俗文化镇。

sent.orig: The town has got its names like Weaving Town and Sewing Town.
sent.trans: 是远近闻名的“织布之乡、”“绗缝之乡”。

sent.orig: When switching to another town in the town window, the correct town music now plays.
sent.trans: 在城镇界面中跳转到另一座城镇时，城镇音乐会正确播放。

sent.orig: Lastly the analyse of case on town construction in the Pingtang town is put up.
sent.trans: 最后以望城县坪塘镇的小城镇建设为对象进行了案例分析。

sent.orig: The 9Id man floats from town to town with nowhere to go and nothing to do.
sent.trans: 这个老人由一个城市游荡到另一个城市，没地方去，也没事做。
